verses.verse: And <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H1157>through<s%> the <S%H7639>lattice<s%> in his <S%H5944>upper<s%> <S%H5944>chamber<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [was] in <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H2470>became<s%> <S%H2470>ill.<s%> So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of Baal-zebub, the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> I shall <S%H2421>recover<s%> from <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2483>sickness.<s%>"

But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H7122>meet<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and <S%H1696>say<s%> to them, 'Is it <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [that] you are <S%H1980>going<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of Baal-zebub, the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>?'

"Now <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'You shall not <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H4296>bed<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you have <S%H5927>gone<s%> up, but you shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>'" Then <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H1980>departed.<s%>
When the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to him he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>"Why<s%> have you <S%H7725>returned<s%>?"

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "A <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to <S%H7122>meet<s%> us and <S%H559>said<s%> to us, <S%H1980>'Go,<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> you and <S%H1696>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>' Is it <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [that] you are <S%H7971>sending<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of Baal-zebub, the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>? <S%H3651>Therefore<s%> you shall not <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H4296>bed<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you have <S%H5927>gone<s%> up, but shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>'"'"

And he <S%H1696>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>"What<s%> <S%H4941>kind<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%> was he <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to <S%H7122>meet<s%> you and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to you?"

And they <S%H559>answered<s%> him, "[He was] a <S%H8181>hairy<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> with a <S%H5785>leather<s%> <S%H232>girdle<s%> <S%H247>bound<s%> about his <S%H4975>loins.<s%>" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite.<s%>"

Then [the <S%H4428>king<s%>] <S%H7971>sent<s%> to him a <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> And he <S%H5927>went<s%> up to him, and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he was <S%H3427>sitting<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill.<s%> And he <S%H1696>said<s%> to him, "O <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> the king <S%H1696>says,<s%> <S%H3381>'Come<s%> <S%H3381>down.<s%>'"

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> to the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> I am a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> let <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H398>consume<s%> you and your <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>" Then <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> him and his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

So he <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to him <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> to him, "O <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3381>'Come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4120>quickly.<s%>'"

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>"If<s%> I am a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> let <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H398>consume<s%> you and your <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>" Then the <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> him and his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

So he <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of a <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> When the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up, he <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3766>bowed<s%> <S%H3766>down<s%> on his <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> and <S%H2603>begged<s%> him and <S%H1696>said<s%> to him, "O <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> let my <S%H5315>life<s%> and the <S%H5315>lives<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> of yours be <S%H3365>precious<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with their <S%H2572>fifties;<s%> but <S%H6258>now<s%> let my <S%H5315>life<s%> be <S%H3365>precious<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>"

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> <S%H3381>"Go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with him; do not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of him." So he <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with him to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Then he <S%H1696>said<s%> to him, <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3282>'Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of Baal-zebub, the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> – is it <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of His <S%H1697>word<s%>? – <S%H3651>therefore<s%> you shall not <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H4296>bed<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you have <S%H5927>gone<s%> up, but shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>'"

So Ahaziah <S%H4191>died<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%> And <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place<s%> in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did,<s%> are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H1697>Chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?
